titleStmt.title: An act for taking special bails in the country upon actions and suits depending in the Courts of King's-Bench, Common-Pleas, and Exchequer at Dublin.
Public General Acts. 1695. 7 Wil.III.c.18.
titleStmt.author: Ireland.
